about_the_game:
Return to the world of NEKO-NIN exHeart in this latest release by developer, Whirlpool! While it's not necessary to enjoy NEKO-NIN exHeart SPIN!, we do suggest checking out the rest of the games in the NEKO-NIN exHeart series. Nin!

STORY


Our hero, Makibishi Kikumaru, has spent his fairly ordinary life so far in the company of his suspiciously tanuki-faced family, his younger sister and their grandfather. His life takes a turn, though, when his grandfather tragically passes away and a catgirl in weird clothes storms the funeral vigil and lets loose a hail of bullets.

At this, his tanuki-faced little sister morphs into a tanuki-eared ninja girl.

Our hero is frozen by the sudden strange sequence of events, but a beautiful woman with cat ears comes their rescue.

"My name is Touka."
"And as for you, Makibishi—or rather, Saiga Kikumaru—I am your protector."

Welcome to your new life, Kikumaru.

1) There are people around this country known as demi-humans, as well as people of other origins, all unbeknownst to the rest of the population.
2) These beings served as ninja during the Sengoku period
3) And they still exist here and there across Japan today.
4) You were born into the Saiga family, who act as intermediaries between this underworld and mainstream society.
5) And so you are already involved in the struggle. If you don't get serious about it, you'll end up dead. (This part is vital.)

Wow. How about that?

As the curtains rise on a new NEKO-NIN chapter, things seem to be a little on the serious side this time.
With our brand-new outfits, we're going to meow meow our way into your heart!

FEATURES

  • NEKO-NIN exHeart series returns with three new heroines
  • Character designs by Takano Yuki
  • SD artwork by Shiro 9-jira
  • Single route, kinetic visual novel
  • Voice playback mode to save your favorite voiced lines for later playback
  • CG gallery mode
  • English and Traditional Chinese language support
  • Japanese full voice support (except main character)

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains suggestive language, sexual (consensual and non-consensual) innuendos, and mature themes that may not be suitable for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space

short_description: Kikumaru's life was fairly normal until a gun wielding catgirl appears during his grandfather's funeral. Even his little sister suddenly sprouts tanuki-ears! A beautiful woman (with cat ears as well) comes to his rescue. The curtain rises on the latest chapter in the NEKO-NIN exHeart series. Nin!
